mention.text: `` DONETSK , Ukraine -LRB- Reuters -RRB- - The Ukrainian separatist region of Donetsk appealed to Moscow on Monday to consider its absorption into the Russian Federation to restore historic justice .
the day after a referendum on self-rule that rebels said had mustered some 80 percent support
The statement , the day after a referendum on self-rule that rebels said had mustered some 80 percent support
Western states who believe the rebellion has been engineered by the Kremlin
a leading member of the self-declared Donetsk People 's Republic , at a news conference in largely Russian-speaking Donetsk
states that formed the core of the now defunct Soviet Union
states that once formed the core of the Soviet Union
Russia , which in March annexed the Crimean peninsula from Ukraine after a referendum , of backing the rebellion with special forces
Russia , which in March annexed the Crimean peninsula from Ukraine after a referendum
cities that have been at the centre of clashes between Ukrainian forces and rebel fighters in recent weeks
Ukraine , Belarus and Russia - states that formed the core of the now defunct Soviet Union -
